name: Fire Elementalist
description: A Conqueror who burns enemies with powerful fire attacks, cleaving through ranks and empowering allies.

abilities.name: Ignition Spark
abilities.description: Allied creatures near the Fire Elementalist capture Altar faster.

abilities.name: Enduring Flame
abilities.description: Damaging burning enemies heals the Fire Elementalist.

abilities.name: Blazing Momentum
abilities.description: When you or your creatures kill a Burning enemy, recharge Elemental spells.

abilities.name: Flame Strikes
abilities.description: Burns enemies with powerful Fire attacks.

abilities.name: Fiery Dash
abilities.description: Performs an invincible dash in a chosen direction.

abilities.name: Burning Conquest
abilities.description: Captures a territory, inflicts Fire damage and fully infuses allied units and Titans with Fire.
